pcd.gui.base

Class PCDMoveListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcd.gui.base.PCDMoveListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, pcd.imageviewer.ImageMouseMotionListener

    public class PCDMoveListener
extends Object
implements pcd.imageviewer.ImageMouseMotionListener
    Author:
    Tibor Sloboda, Noemi Farkas Listens for dragging mouse events (click and hold + move mouse) over image viewport

      • mouseDragged

        public void mouseDragged(pcd.imageviewer.ImageMouseEvent e)
        If left mouse button is used, it drags a point around, changing its coordinates with movement.

        If right mouse button is used, it adjusts the angle as long as mouse is kept within close proximity of the point. The angle will always be in the -90 to 90 degree range.

        Reloads the main GUI tables with every change of angles.

        Specified by:
        mouseDragged in interface pcd.imageviewer.ImageMouseMotionListener
        Parameters:
        e - the mouse event
